A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a stand alone film\, The Last Jedi may have passed for something decent. However\, as a Star Wars film it fell flat on it's face. The major plot points set up by The Force Awakens were thrown out the window. We get pointless story arches that lead nowhere (I believe this is called horseshoeing). It also grossly destroyed Luke's character by changing the farm boy who saw good in everyone to someone that almost does something monstrous because of some doubt. Other things to note are the poor script lines\, length\, and lack of direction. The final sin was that there was no lightsaber duel in the entire movie (something that happens in every movie since A New Hope).
